parameters.name: Collection
parameters.description:
The name of the collection.

>  You can call the [ListCollections](~~2401503~~) operation to query a list of collections.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: ManagerAccount
parameters.description:
The name of the manager account that has the rds_superuser permission.

>  You can create an account on the **Account Management** page of the AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL console or by calling the [CreateAccount](~~2361789~~) operation.

parameters.name: ManagerAccountPassword
parameters.description: The password of the manager account.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The name of the namespace. Default value: public.

>  You can call the [ListNamespaces](~~2401502~~) operation to query a list of namespaces.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The vector type. Valid values:

*   Dense (default)
*   Sparse
